item.title: A curious claim about Advertising's effect on Google
item.description: Note: This article is presented in short form and long form in that order. Feel free to read whichever version you prefer. Google, is it worse now? [short form] In a recently published Freakanomics episode about the perceived quality degradation of Google Search, Marissa Mayer makes a claim that ads made Google a more enjoyable product to Google users. This claim came as the conclusion of a long running experiment in which some users werenâ€™t shown ads, and those shown ads used Google 3% more.
